unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Brand Collabs Galore!**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Brand Collaborations Galore!**

unnormalised: Yo, social media's buzzing with brand collaborations, and it's wild! Forget subtle ads, now it's all about influencers vibing with brands in totally organic (or so they want you to think!) ways.
normalised: Yo, social media's buzzing with brand collaborations, and it's wild! Forget subtle ads, now it's all about influencers vibing with brands in totally organic (or so they want you to think!) ways.

unnormalised: Remember that epic saree collab between designer Anita Dongre and Instagram queen, Komal Pandey? Sales went through the roof just before Diwali! And who could forget the iconic biryani spice mix launched by MasterChef Vikas Khanna with Swiggy last month? Talk about hitting the right taste buds!
normalised: Remember that epic saree collab between designer Anita Dongre and Instagram queen, Komal Pandey? Sales went through the roof just before Diwali! And who could forget the iconic biryani spice mix launched by MasterChef Vikas Khanna with Swiggy last month? Talk about hitting the right taste buds!

unnormalised: It’s not just fashion and food, though. IIT Madras teamed up with a gaming company, "Gamerz Den," to promote their new AI course! Genius, right? Apparently, student applications went up by a whopping 20% afterwards!
normalised: It’s not just fashion and food, though. I I T Madras teamed up with a gaming company, "Gamerz Den," to promote their new A I course! Genius, right? Apparently, student applications went up by a whopping twenty percent afterwards!

unnormalised: Even local businesses are jumping on the bandwagon. Remember Rohan's tea stall in Lucknow working with a local photographer to revamp his Instagram presence? The results are stunning, and his chai is more popular than ever! Brand collabs: The new *desi* marketing mantra, folks! This Onam, keep an eye out, you're sure to spot some new tie-ups. Expect a lot more partnerships like these popping up, so stay tuned!
